content.text:
# Republic of Georgia (disambiguation)

Republic of Georgia may refer to the modern Georgian state during specific historical and constitutional phases:
* Democratic Republic of Georgia, also known as the "First Republic of Georgia", 1918–1921
* Georgian Soviet Socialist Republic, a part of the Soviet Union, 1921–1990
* Georgia, the modern state of Georgia, officially referred to from 1990 to 1995 as the Republic of Georgia.
